			<p>Written by: Gurveen Sekhon On Thursday, April 17th WITI, Women in Technology International, hosted a panel of technology experts that informed the audience on software delivery methods. The key speakers were some really successful and passionate women. The speakers consist of Diane Cochran, a software engineer at Blizzard, Kristine A. <br /><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/witi-comes-to-uci/" class="more-link btn btn-primary">Read More</a></p>

        		</div>

			<p>WICS members got the opportunity to attend the Celebration of Women in Computing in Southern California (CWIC-SoCal) Conference held on April 5th and 6th. The event kicked off with a welcoming ceremony that consisted of talks from inspirational <br /><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/wics-attends-cwic-socal/" class="more-link btn btn-primary">Read More</a></p>

        		</div>

        	</div><!--.blog-header-wrap-->
			<p>On April 4th, Friday of Week 1, Western Digital held a company tour from 10 AM to 3:30 PM for students from Cal Poly Pomona, UCR, and UCI. After breakfast, the first thing on the to-do list was to break apart a hard drive, which was given to the attendees <br /><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/wics-is-invited-to-western-digital/" class="more-link btn btn-primary">Read More</a></p>

                <i class="fa fa-calendar-check-o" aria-hidden="true"></i> <span class="posted-on"><a href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/wics-is-invited-to-western-digital/" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date published" datetime="2014-04-14T20:24:25-07:00">04/14/2014</time><time class="updated" datetime="2014-04-14T20:28:18-07:00">04/14/2014</time></a></span><span class="author vcard"><i class="fa fa-user"></i><a class="url fn n" href="https://wics.ics.uci.edu/author/admin/">admin</a></span>            </footer><!-- .entry-footer -->
		</div><!-- .entry-content -->
	</div>

With the last quarter wrapped up with the Android Development workshops, this quarter brings more projects, information sessions, and social events for members to look forward to!
